typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{(PDH-CSV 4.0) (Arabian Standard Time)(-240)} as string,
		{\JWJ-SPS2019\Memory\% Committed Bytes In Use} as string,
		{\JWJ-SPS2019\Processor(_Total)\% Processor Time} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	partitionRootPath: '*',
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> SourcefromServerdata
SourcefromServerdata select(mapColumn(
		TimeGenerated = {(PDH-CSV 4.0) (Arabian Standard Time)(-240)},
		{Memory Committed Bytes In Use} = {\JWJ-SPS2019\Memory\% Committed Bytes In Use},
		{Processor Time} = {\JWJ-SPS2019\Processor(_Total)\% Processor Time}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SourcefromServerdata sink() ~> sink1
